p: In the present study, we aim to characterize the differential expression proteins involved in the development of E. granulosus. We provide the iTRAQ-based proteomic analysis of proteins present in the three consecutive stages of E. granulosus: oncosphere, adult, and protoscolex. This work provides important information on E. granulosus developmental biology, and also contributes to new strategies and targets to combat E. granulosus infections in humans and animals.
